
HOW CAN YOU BE PROUD? YOU'RE BI! *** Explore four scenes, interact with objects, experience dialogue, and understand bi pride.

# BITSY VERSION 4.8

NAME blue5
DLG ITM_c

DLG ITM_0
Oh, you've moved in with a boy? Guess you've "chosen" then!

DLG ITM_1
I heard you went on a trip with a woman! Proud of you for moving on. And I knew this whole "bisexuality" thing was just a phase!

DLG ITM_2
Life's easier now you're dating a guy. It means you can pass, you know?

DLG ITM_3
Wait, you're coming to pride? But aren't you dating a dude? You're practically straight now!

DLG ITM_4
I don't think I could date a bi girl. I mean, I just couldn't trust them, you know?

DLG ITM_5
Don't you know it's politically incorrect to identify as bisexual? You should be pansexual, like me!

DLG ITM_6
So, if you're bi, does that mean you need to date multiple people at the same time?

DLG ITM_7
Have you ever had a threesome?

DLG ITM_8
Ugh, bisexuals are just greedy.

DLG ITM_9
Ew, I just don't understand why you'd even consider dating men...

DLG ITM_a
Ugh, bisexuals aren't real. They just like to kiss women at parties so they can get attention. I'm so sick of bi girls everywhere.

DLG ITM_b
Hey, so, I want us to be exclusive, but if you want to hook up with other women, that doesn't count. Especially if I get to be there.

DLG ITM_c
I wouldn't date bi girls because there's just such a high chance they'll cheat on you. I love hooking up with them though because they're wild in bed.

DLG ITM_d
Bi pride is about finding other people who have heard all the same things before.

DLG ITM_e
Bi pride is about feeling validated in your identity, and not being scared that maybe it is just a phase after all. (Not that there's anything wrong with that either!)

DLG ITM_f
Bi pride is loving who you want, when you want, however you want. My love and relationships are not yours to dictate.
